column4: lol.. this is good.. I went to chmod 777 /var/run/file and accidentally typed chmod 777 / var/run/file  .. notice the space...  im not sure how many hundreds of files it changed before i aborted it but now I cannot SU ...
is there a way to revert all system files back to their normal attributes?
and you technically only changed /, not any other files (you didn't use -r)
